front.title: IPNGLS - IP Next Generation Label Switching

abstract.t: This document proposes the forwarding of IPv6 packets using labelswitching techniques, with the same advantages of the MultiprotocolLabel Switching (MPLS) architecture. The document proposes themapping of all MPLS header fields into the IPv6 header, raisingseveral advantages like the simplicity of the model, the decrease ofoverhead, and others. This mapping was called IP Next GenerationLabel Switching, or just IPngLS, and can work concurrently withMPLS, i.e. IPv6 packets are forwarded with IPngLS and IPv4 packetsare forwarded with MPLS.
